fields.description: A unique identifier for a Headcount Plan Structure.
The Name of the Headcount Plan Structure.

Select this box if you would like to link your headcount plan to a financial budget. This will require you to use the existing fiscal schedule used for your financial budget and to select Company as a dimension for your headcount plan.
The statistic types that the Headcount Plan Structure is planned by - FTE and/or Headcount.
Dimensions for the Headcount Plan Structure.
Contains the data for the Headcount Plan S

Dimension_Reference.description: Dimensions for the Headcount Plan Structure.

Headcount_Plan_Structure_ID.description: A unique identifier for a Headcount Plan Structure.

Headcount_Plan_Structure_Name.description: The Name of the Headcount Plan Structure.

Headcount_Plan_Structure_Schedule_Data.description: Contains the data for the Headcount Plan S

Link_to_Financial_Budget.description: Select this box if you would like to link your headcount plan to a financial budget. This will require you to use the existing fiscal schedule used for your financial budget and to select Company as a dimension for your headcount plan.

Statistic_Type_Reference.description: The statistic types that the Headcount Plan Structure is planned by - FTE and/or Headcount.
